Class ItemPrimedPendant

org.cyclops.evilcraft.item.ItemPrimedPendant
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.item.Item>, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.IInformationProvider
public class ItemPrimedPendant extends ItemBloodContainer
One potion can be inserted to continuously apply it to the player.
